sentence:
• The Home Depot, Inc. (NYSE: HD ) posted first quarter earnings per share of $0.65, matching the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.65
• J.C. Penney Company, Inc. (NYSE: JCP ) reported first quarter loss per share of $0.75, surpassing the Zacks Consensus Estimate loss of $0.11
• Shares of Dicks Sporting Goods Inc (NYSE: DKS ) gained 5.9% after it posted first quarter earnings per share of $0.45, beating the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.38
• Amylin Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (NASDAQ: AMLN ) rose 6.4%, a day after it announced that one of its directors had purchased 18,000 shares of Amylin
• Shares of The TJX Companies, Inc. (NYSE: TJX ) gained 6.9% after it posted first quarter earnings per share of $0.55, surpassing the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.54
• Avon Products, Inc. (NYSE: AVP ) declined 9.7% after Coty Inc. withdrew its $10.7 billion acquisition bid since Avon had failed to initiate talks yesterday, which was the cut-off date
